title: trouble loading my info into thunderbird
content: I am trying to setup a account with Thunderbird it says i might need to setup manually. My email is tomwbarnes1@bellsouth.net which is now yahoo.
creator: tomwbarnes1

title: Aparência do thunderbird
content: Tenho instalado o Thunderbird o qual tenho usado como gerenciador de meus e-mails há muito tempo. A última versão que possuo vejo uma dificuldade em relação ao uso da barra de rolagem, ao lado direito, para selecionar uma mensagem qualquer etc., pois, a barra e a seta são muito pequenas, estreitas o que torna dificultoso colocar a seta do cursor em cima das mesmas e movimentar as mensagens... Pergunto: é possível aumentar o tamanho da seta e a largura da barra vertical? Aproveito para parabenizar toda a equipe que desenvolveu e dá manutenção nesse plug-in, que para mim, é o melhor disparado no que toca a gerenciar mensagens por e-mail. Muito o brigado!!!!
creator: 888zanella

title: Off-line use/mode for Android tablet
content:
I've looked through FAQs and found off-line capability within Thunderbird for Windows. However, the off-line icon is not available on my tablet or in a menu.

Thanks Jeff

title: Import Gmail
content:
Hi, I am trying to import an .mbox file that I exported from gmail but continuously getting error "import failed unexpectedly, more information may be available in the error console". Can somebody help please? I have tried selecting different options but none of them work.

Thank you heaps.

title: Saving files externally
content: I want to save files externally from the service provider so that they are on my PC. Could this be POP3 and can old files be converted to this or:- Is the another way of saving directories of data to my PC Thanks Alan

title: thunderbird upgrade verlangt neustart.
content:
Hallo, es wurde über Nacht ein neues Update von Thunderbird heruntergeladen. Das Upgrade verlangt einen Neustart. Nach erfolgtem Neustart öffnet sich Thunderbird immer noch nicht. Es kommt immer und immer wieder die Meldung. Thunderbird upgrade verlangt einen Neustart. Was sollen wir machen?

Viele Grüße F. Cöllen
creator: franziska.coellen

title: Thunderbird Zombie Email and Empty Folders
content:
I'm using 128.5esr (64-bit) in Mac. There was a email in inbox ; I can mark it as read-under but cannot delete, move; I tried many times delete or move but nothing happened. After several restart that zombie email left but also I saw many empty folders which must have hundred emails in it...

my last backup belongs to months ago, so I lost all important emails. How to recover it I do not know. Any advice ?
creator: cansarigul
